pages.text: $(li)The Void Core is a weapon that can be used right clicking while you are holding it in your hand to summon pillars on the ground that will inflict 4 to 7 hearts of damage in any creature that hits.$(br)$(li)After that, you will not be able to use it again for seven seconds.

pages.name: Void Core
pages.text: It can only be dropped by the $(l:patchouli:bosses/ender_golem)Ender Golem$(/l).
